scripts.build: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public && mkdir -p dist && cp -r pages public/pages && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp -r css public/css && cp -f css/style.css dist/style.css && cp -r images public/images && cp -r scripts public/scripts
